title: Build fitness app with AI transformation and walk tracking

requirements.text: Create a bold landing page with the motivational message 'Make a change today and thank you for tomorrow' displayed prominently

quotes: bold landing page saying "Make a change today and thank you for tomorrow"

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page displays the exact message 'Make a change today and thank you for tomorrow'
Message is visually prominent with bold typography
Landing page serves as the app entry point

requirements.text: Implement customizable color themes that allow users to switch between different color palettes throughout the app
acceptanceCriteria: Users can select from multiple predefined color themes
Theme selection persists across sessions
Theme changes apply consistently across all app pages
Theme preferences are stored in backend user state

requirements.text: Build an AI-powered photo transformation feature where users upload their current photo and select a duration in months of exercise/meal plans to generate and display a projected transformation image

quotes: AI-powered photo transformation feature where you upload your picture and select a month of exercise/meal plans to see a projected transformation

acceptanceCriteria: Users can upload a photo from their device
Users can select a duration in months (e.g., 1, 3, 6, 12 months)
System generates a projected transformation image based on the selected duration
Generated transformation is displayed alongside the original photo
Transformation images are stored and retrievable

requirements.text: Create a location tracking tab with an interactive map that tracks walks in real-time with start/stop controls

quotes: location tracking tab that maps your walks with start/stop buttons

acceptanceCriteria: Dedicated tab displays an interactive map
Start button initiates walk tracking and begins recording route
Stop button ends tracking session
Map displays the walk route in real-time during tracking
Route path is visible on the map after tracking stops

requirements.text: Calculate and display calories burned and step count for each tracked walk session

quotes: displays calories burned and steps taken

acceptanceCriteria: System calculates calories burned based on walk duration and distance
System counts steps during the walk
Calories burned and steps are displayed in the tracking interface
Walk session data (calories, steps, route) is persisted in backend

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual theme with energetic, fitness-focused aesthetics using vibrant colors, modern typography, and motivational design elements that inspire action and progress
acceptanceCriteria: App uses an energetic color palette (avoiding blue and purple unless specified)
Typography choices convey motivation and boldness
Layout and spacing create an inspiring, action-oriented experience
Visual style remains consistent across all pages and features

constraints: AI photo transformation must work without external AI service APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
Location tracking and mapping must function without GPS services or external mapping APIs
Real-time walk tracking cannot use WebSockets or similar real-time communication protocols
nonGoals: External authentication providers beyond Internet Identity

required: Hero background image with fitness-themed abstract design showing movement and energy (hero-fitness.dim_1920x1080.png)
Motivational icon representing transformation and progress (transform-icon.dim_256x256.png)
